description: Authentication and authorization system with JWT and RBAC
features: POST /register - Password validation: min 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 number
POST /login - Lock account after 5 failed attempts
POST /login - Generate JWT token with 1-hour expiration
GET /admin - Require role=admin AND valid token
Rate limiting: Max 5 login attempts per minute
objectives: Test JWT token generation and validation
Ensure account lockout after failed attempts
